mapper.insert: insert into ib_CODEMASTER a ( a.largeCategoryCd, a.largeCategoryName, a.middleCategoryCd, a.middleCategoryName, a.smallCategoryCd, a.smallCategoryName, a.description, a.orderNo, a.systemFlg, a.deleteFlg) values( #{largeCategoryCd jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{largeCategoryName jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{middleCategoryCd jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{middleCategoryName jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smallCategoryCd jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smallCategoryName jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{systemFlg jdbcType=INTEGER}, 0)
mapper.select: select a.largeCategoryCd, a.smallCategoryCd, a.orderNo from ib_CODEMASTER a where a.orderNo = #{orderNo} and a.deleteFlg = 0
select a.smallCategoryName, a.smallCategoryCd from IB_CODEMASTER a where a.largeCategoryCd = #{largeCategoryCd} and a.deleteFlg=0
